column9: NOTE about "Elective" course requirements:  When completing a double major or two degree plan of study, it is not necessary to be specific on any "Electives" unless the class to be taken to fill an elective is required for one of the majors.  This will allow you more flexibility in scheduling and avoid the need to later file a revised plan of study.  If a specific course is listed to fulfill an elective, that specific course must then be taken.

column9: For 2018-2019: 48 credit hours of math/science between both programs
For 2019-2020: 45 credit hours of math/science between both programs
May need to include MA elective, and/or MA/SCI elective

column4: Intro to Prob w/ Apps to Statistics

column9: ABET Requirements for Engineering Courses 2nd major
For 2018-2019: 72 credit hours of engineering courses
For 2019-2020: 68 credit hours of engineering courses
For 2nd major, must have a 12-credit capstone design sequence or
appropriate substitution for OE415, OE416, and OE417.
The engineering electives may need to be filled as indicated if not
filled with appropriate engineering courses from the primary major.
The total number of engineering credits must be satisfied as indicated
in the note above.  ECE340 cannot be used as an engineering elective.
